title: How to Do a Wheelie on a Bicycle

steps.headline: Find a gear that can comfortably and quickly accelerate the bike from a walking or jogging pace.
Pedal and pull back on your handlebars simultaneously.
Keep pedaling aggressively and smoothly, leaning back with your arms fully extended.
Accelerate quicker if you find yourself having difficulties getting your front wheel off the ground
Pedal more slowly if you are tending to fall backward.

text: Find a gear that can comfortably and quickly accelerate the bike from a walking or jogging pace.  Pedal and pull back on your handlebars simultaneously.  Keep pedaling aggressively and smoothly, leaning back with your arms fully extended.  Accelerate quicker if you find yourself having difficulties getting your front wheel off the ground  Pedal more slowly if you are tending to fall backward.
